title: On my Pixel 2 with Android 10 there is no "modify" option after long press on wifi network name?
content:
I am trying to change the DNS settings on my network to troubleshoot an online game not working.

When I got to WiFi and long press on the connected network, the only options I see are "forget".

How do I change the DNS settings on Android 10 Pixel 2 or even get to the "modify" option?
